01.The Convergence

My journey is unique. It didn't start with code; it started with people. From serving as JIF President of the Royal Ambassadors to leading operations, I learned that systems fail without human empathy.

Currently, I am fusing this leadership experience with technical rigor at NOUN and MaxME Solutions. I believe in building technology that serves humanity.
